short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically load secret panels for web comics

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically finds hidden Easter eggs within web comics, such as title text or extra panels, and displays them below the comic.

Currently supports
smbc-comics.com
amazingsuperpowers.com
xkcd.com
abstrusegoose.com
boatcrime.com
qwantz.com

Source is at http://github.com/wfriesen/comic-helper
